comment:
* The LightsManager class allows control over device lights.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public List<Light> getLights()
methods.comment:
* Returns the lights available on the device.
     *
     * @return A list of available lights

methods.name: public LightState getLightState(@NonNull Light light)
methods.comment:
* Returns the state of a specified light.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public LightsSession openSession()
methods.comment: * Creates a new LightsSession that can be used to control the device lights.

methods.name: public LightsSession openSession(int priority)
methods.comment:
*
     * Creates a new {@link LightsSession}
     *
     * @param priority the larger this number, the higher the priority of this session when multiple
     *                 light state requests arrive simultaneously.
     *
     * @hide
